title: Maze: Adaptive Constrained Code Generation System
Phase 1: Foundation
notes: Phase 1 complete: Core type system, constraints, llguidance integration, TypeScript indexer, testing infrastructure. All performance targets exceeded (50μs p99 masks, 89% cache hit rate).

title: Phase 2: Syntactic Constraints
description: Implement CFG/Lark grammar builder, multi-language grammars, JSON Schema synthesis, and complete provider adapters. Target: <100μs masks, <50ms compilation, >70% cache hits.

title: Implement CFG/Lark grammar builder
description: Create grammar builder that can generate Lark grammars from templates. Support language-specific customization and optimization passes.

title: Create TypeScript grammar template
description: Complete Lark grammar for TypeScript including functions, classes, interfaces, types, and common patterns. Test with diverse TypeScript code.

title: Create Python grammar template
description: Complete Lark grammar for Python including functions, classes, decorators, type hints, and common patterns.

title: Create Rust grammar template
description: Complete Lark grammar for Rust including traits, impl blocks, lifetime annotations, and macros.

title: Implement JSON Schema synthesis
description: Build JSON Schema generator from type definitions. Support Pydantic models, TypeScript interfaces, and nested structures.

title: Complete provider adapters
description: Finalize adapters for OpenAI, vLLM, SGLang, and llama.cpp. Test with actual providers and validate performance.

title: Phase 3: Type System
description: Implement type inhabitation solver, bidirectional type inference, and language-specific type systems. Target: <1ms type search, >75% type error reduction, <5 iterations convergence.

title: Phase 4: Validation & Repair
description: Build multi-level validators (syntax, types, tests, lint), RUNE sandbox integration, repair loop with constraint refinement, and pedantic_raven integration. Target: <3 avg repair attempts, >90% repair success.

title: Phase 5: Adaptive Learning
description: Implement pattern mining, constraint learning, project-specific adaptation, and full mnemosyne integration. Target: >10% improvement with learning, pattern recall across sessions.

title: Phase 6: Production
description: Optimize performance (speculative decoding), complete multi-provider support, IDE integrations, comprehensive benchmarking (HumanEval, MBPP, SWE-bench), and production documentation.
